attributes.action: Make it easier for young adults to get on the property ladder or rent
attributes.background: It’s not easy for the younger generation to get themselves into rented accommodation or to even get themselves on the property laser as a first time buyer this needs to be made easier for all first timers especially young adults as it’s next to impossible compared to around 50 years ago

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you would like more help for young adults to get on the property ladder, but are not sure what help you would like.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
